data.text: Eh? The reason I'm chasing after Maruzen-san?
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed: 󠁿Eh? The reason I'm chasing after Maruzen-san?

data.text:
Up until now, Sakura Chiyono O's driving motivation had been a 
mix of fear, of resignation, and of genuine admiration.
data.processed:
󠁿Up until now, Sakura Chiyono O's driving motivation had been a 
󠁿mix of fear, of resignation, and of genuine admiration.

data.text:
If she can remember those feelings… she should 
be able to escape this quagmire she's found herself 
in. I ask her about those feelings.
data.processed:
󠁿If she can remember those feelings… she should 
󠁿be able to escape this quagmire she's found herself 
󠁿in. I ask her about those feelings.

data.text:
That's, um. 
Because she's faster, and stronger than anyone-
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed:
󠁿That's, um. 
󠁿Because she's faster, and stronger than anyone-

data.text: …She has, what I lack…
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed: 󠁿…She has, what I lack…

data.text:
-Thinking back, every since I was small, I've been good at 
running, and I loved it… joining a club, racing, winning a lot.
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed:
󠁿-Thinking back, every since I was small, I've been good at 
󠁿running, and I loved it… joining a club, racing, winning a lot.

data.text:
My my, Chiyo-chan you've got alot of talent, don't you? 
Someday you're going to enroll at Tracen Academy, you say?
data.name: Relative
data.processed:
󠁿My my, Chiyo-chan you've got alot of talent, don't you? 
󠁿Someday you're going to enroll at Tracen Academy, you say?

data.text:
Yeah! I'm going to become an amazing Uma Musume-! 
Everyday, I'm training at home with my big brother, too!
data.name: Young Chiyono O
data.processed:
󠁿Yeah! I'm going to become an amazing Uma Musume-! 
󠁿Everyday, I'm training at home with my big brother, too!

data.text:
With the help of my outstanding brother, I was able to pass the 
best academy's entrance exams and leave moderate results. With 
pride I enrolled, but what awaited me was-
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed:
󠁿With the help of my outstanding brother, I was able to pass the 
󠁿best academy's entrance exams and leave moderate results. With 
󠁿pride I enrolled, but what awaited me was-

data.text:
Hey, did you see the mock race that Mister CB was 
in?! When she pulled away at the end, that was super 
cool, I've never seen anything like that!
data.name: Classmate A
data.processed:
󠁿Hey, did you see the mock race that Mister CB was 
󠁿in?! When she pulled away at the end, that was super 
󠁿cool, I've never seen anything like that!

data.text:
Hey now, Oguri cap is really cool too! Seriously, 
it's like watching a prodigy running, that acceleration is crazy!
data.name: Classmate B
data.processed:
󠁿Hey now, Oguri cap is really cool too! Seriously, 
󠁿it's like watching a prodigy running, that acceleration is crazy!

data.text: At Tracen Academy, I was just a normal, everyday, Uma Musume.
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed: 󠁿At Tracen Academy, I was just a normal, everyday, Uma Musume.

data.text: …well then, good work!
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed: 󠁿…well then, good work!

data.text:
Huh, Chiyo-chan? We don't have an instructor, 
so it sounds like there's no training today.
data.name: Classmate A
data.processed:
󠁿Huh, Chiyo-chan? We don't have an instructor, 
󠁿so it sounds like there's no training today.

data.text: Ah, yeah! I thought I'd do some self training!
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed: 󠁿Ah, yeah! I thought I'd do some self training!

data.text:
Haaa, haaa, haaa…! 
…ku… taaaaaaaaa!
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed:
󠁿Haaa, haaa, haaa…! 
󠁿…ku… taaaaaaaaa!

data.text: No matter how much I ran, that feeling kept getting stronger.
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed: 󠁿No matter how much I ran, that feeling kept getting stronger.

data.text: Haaa, haaa, haaa!
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed: 󠁿Haaa, haaa, haaa!

data.text:
Yeah, for someone that just enrolled, not bad! There'll be some 
challenges, but let's work on clearing them one by one!
data.name: Instructor
data.processed:
󠁿Yeah, for someone that just enrolled, not bad! There'll be some 
󠁿challenges, but let's work on clearing them one by one!

data.text: (For someone who just enrolled, huh?)
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed: 󠁿(For someone who just enrolled, huh?)

data.text: …Instructor, what are my strong points?
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed: 󠁿…Instructor, what are my strong points?

data.text:
Let's see. It's not flashy, but in the end your 
steadiness eventually wins out. You're earnest, 
so you've probably got a solid foundation.
data.name: Instructor
data.processed:
󠁿Let's see. It's not flashy, but in the end your 
󠁿steadiness eventually wins out. You're earnest, 
󠁿so you've probably got a solid foundation.

data.text: A steady, earnest, Uma Musume.
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed: 󠁿A steady, earnest, Uma Musume.

data.text: With that, is there anything I can become…?
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed: 󠁿With that, is there anything I can become…?

data.text: What is it that I want to become here?
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed: 󠁿What is it that I want to become here?

data.text: Then, one day. A fateful day
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed: 󠁿Then, one day. A fateful day

data.text:
Maruzensky pulls farther and farther ahead! She increases the 
separation by 3 length, 4 lengths, - Strong, as expected!
data.name: Commentator
data.processed:
󠁿Maruzensky pulls farther and farther ahead! She increases the 
󠁿separation by 3 length, 4 lengths, - Strong, as expected!

data.text: Fufuu, here I gooo!
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: 󠁿Fufuu, here I gooo!

data.text: The one who was there -an absurdly vivid, "Super Car".
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed: 󠁿The one who was there -an absurdly vivid, "Super Car".

data.text: Ah, wa, wa, ah…!
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed: 󠁿Ah, wa, wa, ah…!

data.text:
Someone who had everything I lacked, an Uma Musume dyed in red. 
It left a huge impact.
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed:
󠁿Someone who had everything I lacked, an Uma Musume dyed in red. 
󠁿It left a huge impact.

data.text:
My excitement wouldn't subside, it couldn't be helped. 
Because of these heightened emotions, all those thoughts 
running through my head came together-
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed:
󠁿My excitement wouldn't subside, it couldn't be helped. 
󠁿Because of these heightened emotions, all those thoughts 
󠁿running through my head came together-

data.text:
A steady, earnest Uma Musume -however. 
That's wrong, higher, I want to reach even higher…!
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed:
󠁿A steady, earnest Uma Musume -however. 
󠁿That's wrong, higher, I want to reach even higher…!

data.text:
Even if the training is difficult, even if I can't 
reach it, even if it takes a long time, I want 
to get faster, stronger, just like her-
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed:
󠁿Even if the training is difficult, even if I can't 
󠁿reach it, even if it takes a long time, I want 
󠁿to get faster, stronger, just like her-

data.text: I want to be like Maruzensky-san…!
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed: 󠁿I want to be like Maruzensky-san…!

data.text: In an instant, the world became brilliant.
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed: 󠁿In an instant, the world became brilliant.

data.text: Thanks for the food!
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed: 󠁿Thanks for the food!

data.text:
Spaghetti with, nata de coco and tiramisu…? 
…is this perhaps, a trend that's coming back in to fashion?
data.name: Mejiro Ardan
data.processed:
󠁿Spaghetti with, nata de coco and tiramisu…? 
󠁿…is this perhaps, a trend that's coming back in to fashion?

data.text:
Eh? Ehe, ehehehe…! It's nothing like that, it's just, well the 
senpai I look up to eats this, so without thinking…
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed:
󠁿Eh? Ehe, ehehehe…! It's nothing like that, it's just, well the 
󠁿senpai I look up to eats this, so without thinking…

data.text:
Well, when it comes to magazines featuring Maruzensky-san, 
these seem to be all of them.
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
󠁿Well, when it comes to magazines featuring Maruzensky-san, 
󠁿these seem to be all of them.

data.text:
Waa, there's a lot…! Thank you very much! 
Is it fine for me to borrow all of them?
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed:
󠁿Waa, there's a lot…! Thank you very much! 
󠁿Is it fine for me to borrow all of them?

data.text:
Of course, that's fine but… Fufu. 
You really like Maruzen-san don't you?
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
󠁿Of course, that's fine but… Fufu. 
󠁿You really like Maruzen-san don't you?

data.text: Eh? Ah… ehehe, Yes!
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed: 󠁿Eh? Ah… ehehe, Yes!

data.text: Haa, haa…!
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed: 󠁿Haa, haa…!

data.text:
(My time, is it a little too fast…? 
No, "If you don't run, the scenery will never change", right?!)
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed:
󠁿(My time, is it a little too fast…? 
󠁿No, "If you don't run, the scenery will never change", right?!)

data.text:
Alllright, from now on I'm going to work hard every morning! 
Chiyono Fight O-!
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed:
󠁿Alllright, from now on I'm going to work hard every morning! 
󠁿Chiyono Fight O-!

data.text:
…I see, that's right. 
I wanted to do everything I could to be by Maruzensky's side.
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed:
󠁿…I see, that's right. 
󠁿I wanted to do everything I could to be by Maruzensky's side.

data.text:
Even then, I forgot all of that, 
wondering what I should do from now on, thinking only about that-
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O

choices.text: What do you want to do now?

data.processed:
󠁿Even then, I forgot all of that, 
󠁿wondering what I should do from now on, thinking only about that-

data.text: Right now-
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed: 󠁿Right now-

data.text: I want to fight…!
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed: 󠁿I want to fight…!
